page.title: 17ATTITUDES -IDEAL FUTURE HOME
page.content: My ideal future home would be a farm complete with a thatched roof cottage to be my home. I wouldn't want a gigantic home but a nice sized cottage with two or three bedrooms in it. I'd have an old fashioned kitchen with a stone floor. In my home I'd like shutters at the windows. In the living room I'd have an old wooden rocking chair with a patchwork cushion resting on it. Ivy and rose plants would grow on the outside of the cottage. The garden wouldn't be too big - just a nice size to have flowers and a vegetable patch growing up from rich soil. On the farm I'd keep lots of different animals.
